title: Day 387 Still no fix for Zyra plant Health
body:
Just LOVE hitting a 4 seed ult on the enemy team.

Love Seeing them get knocked into the air.... Thats when I notice that all the ulted plants are dead.  Not one shot went off...

Love Catching {{champion:21}} With E and plant two seeds behind her and Q.... to see her Auto attack each one and kill both before they get one attack off.

Love Hitting {{champion:157}}  with E and spawning 4 plants around him... to see him E to each, killing them with each E and is now right on top of me.

Love spawning 3 Plants to easily clear a wave as {{champion:245}}  is pushing into my turret.. to see him press Q and watch all plants die as the Timewinder return to him after killing all my minions too.

QFT.

Preach. I mean Zyra is a strong addition to any team, but I'd give up a lot of her utility just to have her plants be...you know. Useful. You could remove them entirely from her kit, keep the numbers on everything else the same, and honestly she wouldn't feel all that different.

Sad.

Removing plants from her kit is an interesting idea, but she'd need a new passive and a new W.  Any thoughts about that?

Passive: Fertilizer - whenever a champion (ally or enemy) dies near zyra she gains a small amount of a bonus stat (max hp/mana or 4 AP).  
W: Fruit of Life and Death - an AoE zone that lasts a few seconds, poisoning enemies in it and healing allies in it.

Im sorry I like her plants.  They just need to make them more like {{champion:74}} for survivability.  

They have a 8s duration but NEVER live past 3s.   Just freaking make them take zero damage and only last for 6s.  Lower the damage but give them better AI and be done with it
I like her plants as well, I was just trying a thought experiment on what would have to be done if they were gone.
Don't firget fiora can just basic+hydra in 1 second and even ulted plants are dead.

yeah it's real sad how fragile her plants it, in early game it works out but in the late game, when around 70% of your damage comes from plants it feels bad when a slight breeze just vaporizes them and you're left with no damage.

zyra Q has 0.6 AP ratio, E has 0.5 AP ratio and ult has 0.7 AP ratio so a grand total of 1.8 AP ratio on her entire kit without plants, make that 1.1 if ult is on cooldown meaning once you've utled and your plants died your damage is worthless, and your plants will die, to EVERYTHING.

and don't forger using a W+W+E on a melee champion and watch them 1shot the plant before it can even attack
Oh well. You already get to do the most damage in the game half the time.
This is Season 8. Do you want Zyra's plants to live longer than champions? :P

The best part? Riot at some point, as I've been told, changed her plants so they NEEDED to take... 2 autos. 2 AUTOS. to die. How many do they take? Just 1, usually.

Honestly something does need to be done to her plants. As they are something she heavily relies on to be, well... Zyra... it's kinda dumb an adc can just walk up, auto once, and they're dead.

Every time that i play her mid lane i will mostly win the lane but i will fall off too fast ({{champion:63}} instead deal crazy damage in the entire game).

I would appreciate if they revert his E buff to find a way to buff her mid-late game on her damage spell.
